attributes.action: Raise the Mp's retirement age in line with normal working tax payers retirement.
attributes.background: Mp's retire several years before us normal working tax payers, Why should they be treated better in their two tier system when we have to carry on working.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses, pay and pensions. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
